## UgduRuntime.register() method

Registers an `app`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
register(name: string, predicate: (pathname: string) => boolean, load: () => Promise<any>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The <code>app</code>'s name |
|  predicate | (pathname: string) =&gt; boolean | Whether this <code>app</code> should be active |
|  load | () =&gt; Promise&lt;any&gt; | The load function of this <code>app</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

The `app` actually is the entry `package`<!-- -->. We can register multiple `app` in one project. And those `app` could based on different framework.
